You know I'm now realizing how quickly time is flying by. It's my last year at university and it's mind boggling to me that I've gotten this far. My mother thought I would never make it past high school, which is very odd considering I was a good student. Weird. 

In other news....The Gilmore Extravaganza Viewing Party was a hit. It's a little crazy when you get 5 Gilmore fans in a room and just start watching favorite episodes or just episodes that are good and make you laugh. I think we literally sat there for 9 hours with a couple of breaks for food and other necessities. We're all a little crazy though! It was nice just getting together with the girls and it was so sad having them leave the next morning. But all good things must come to an end, or so I'm told. 

I'm moving my stuff into our apartment next Thursday and then coming home for the weekend. I officially move in the 28th and classes start the 30th. I'm looking forward to the few classes I have, but I am dreading Practicum and my commute to East Providence once or twice a week. I really don't think I'm cut out for this teaching gig. What was I thinking? Oh well at least I'm not the only one freaking out about teaching. My roomie is freaked out too, of course that doesn't bode well for the two of us living together. That means we'll be freaking out on a regular basis and it means the undecisiveness we both have with be at it's peak. 

Thankfully I know a lot of people living near us in the surrounding apts. R and K will bring some much needed partying to us. Of course the one year where I know I will need the relaxation I should be buckling down and writing lesson plans....how fun!

Looking forward to packing my crap up.....which won't be much since a lot of my stuff has remained packed and sitting on the living room floor collecting dust. Everything except my clothes and shoes and other things I use daily. I still have gifts from Europe that I need to give to people. I'm a bad friend! Here's to wanting to go back to school to see my friends, but not to work! 

More later
S.

Ok.....so it's been a little while, well....maybe it's been...ok it's been forever since I've written, ok, happy now that I've admitted it? So I'm sure some of you have noticed the little flashy thingy telling u I updated and you probably did a doubletake...yeah I'm still alive, but barely. 

Saturday I had to do fucking community service from 10-4 at Coggeshall Farm....and I was feeling awesomely crappy. And did I mention the rain? The fucking rain...thank god I decided to park outside of the dorm Friday night without getting a ticket, which was pleasant. Emily and I kept calling Public Safety to ask if it was canceled cuz apparently there was a shuttle taking people to the farm , but I chose to drive. The fucking asshole who was answering the phone kept misunderstanding saying the shuttle was leaving at 10 when it wasn't supposed to leave till 10:30....he was fucking WRONG....I kept saying no u don't understand, but no.....he's a dumbfuck....I can't help that people r stupid.....sorry there seems to be some pent up rage.....anyway....me and Em get to the farm and they can't make up their fucking minds whether to cancel or not....so we learn about the farm, which is actually cool....stand around for an hour....thank god the guy who lived there started some fires...which was nice.....finally we got sent home and me and Em went to get breakfast anf hightailed it home to do nothing but watch movies....lemme tell you Taking Lives with Angelina Jolie and Ethan Hawke is fucking awesome!
  So sunday rolls around and hey....there's a Reno 911 marathon and I'm really sick and me and Em can't tear ourselves away from it! So did nothing all weekend.....
GUESS WHO'S COMING HOME THIS WEEKEND!!!!
If u didn't guess me ur not my friend and I don't know who u r!
So yeah Mercedes wants to buy my car back so I'm driving back Friday and Saturday morning Mi Padre and I r going to go talk to them and see how much more it will cost for me to get a 2005....and no Parker I don't think I will be able to afford an E class.....but u never know and I will never drive the station wagon.....so I'm assuming they'll just give me another ML320 2005 edition...but who knows....

Have I written enough...are u bored yet???
I'm sick...it sucks major ass....Lea, why have u not called me?!?!?!
OK....I'm done....say whatever u want.....maybe I'll start writing more religiously....then again..I never can seem to do it, but I'll try.
Lea stop doing crystal so u can visit me!!!!!

Oh man this weekend went by soooooooooo fast! But Thursday I saw Maroon 5...So AWESOME!!!! I love their songs!! Saw Kill Bill vol.2.  very good...still partial to vol. 1 though, but I think that's because I just saw it! O well, here's yet another survey, damnit people stop putting surveys on ur journals, I read them and then if they're cool I put them on mine!!! So Stop! Or at least put up crappy ones that make me wish I never saw them! Alright rambling and Alisha just put on Indiana Jones and I wanna watch it so Ima fill out this survey real quick and return to the movie!

Mystic River

 20: Imagine your first child is a girl, what do you call her?: Lydia, Anya Olivia, maybe an Audrey..I dunno

Moi

Ha!!! It has only taken me almost 3 months to update!!!!! How sad, but I found this extremely long survey...and I'm bored so I will take it!!!!


Basics

Your gender: I'm a girl!

Straight/Gay/Bi: Straight

Single?: Mmmhmmm

If not, do you want to be?: N/A

Birthdate: Dec. 3 my b-day has passed...did you get me a prezzie?

Your age: 18

Age you act: It depends who I'm with! Sometimes like a 2 year old and other times like my age or older.

Age you wish you were: umm.....I think 18....not ready to move on to another age

Your height: 5'4"

Eye color: It says blue on birth certificate, but sometimes I think they were wrong

Happy with it?: Yup

Hair color: I am a dirty blonde.....mind out of the gutter please!

Happy with it? Yah

Lefty/righty/ambidextrous: I use my right for most things

Your living arrangement: Live with either my mom or my pop depends on the arrangements made between my parents...otherwise I am in a dorm!

Your family: Dysfunctional....a book title comes to mind: All Families Are Psychotic.

Have any pets?: Yah huh....2 Portuguese Water Dogs, one brown and one blackish gray

What's your job?: Full time student, on breaks I am a cashier/bagger at a small grocery store.

Piercings?: Ears

Obsessions?: Hmmm......I'm just going to leave this convienently blank.

Addictions?: chocolate? I'm trying to break the soda thing, but that's not working too well...I'm down to a soda a day sort of when I don't cheat!

Do you speak another language?: English, Bad english, and some espanol!

Have a favorite quote?: Too many to choose from! Here's one: "No life is a waste. The only time we waste is the time we spend thinking we are alone." - from the book The Five People We Meet in Heaven.

Do you have a webpage?: Nope! 

Deep Thoughts About Life and You In It

Do you live in the moment?: I try to....I have moved on from living in the past.  

Do you consider yourself tolerant of others?: Yes, very....although I don't tolerate people well when another person has annoyed me or I am angry at someone.

Do you have any secrets?: Are you kidding?! Of course I do. Everyone always has something that they keep to themselves....it is a fact that everyone is not themselves around other people all the time. 

Do you hate yourself?: I'm getting over that....I found I am more angry with someone else and not myself.

Do you like your handwriting?: Yeah actually I do!

Do you have any bad habits?: Umm....I don't know, I think my friends are a better judge of that!

What is the compliment you get from most people?: Oh my God! How do you know that person's name? I am the go to girl when it comes to asking me about what a famous persons name is....it sounds weird when I explain it, but those of you who know understand what I am talking about!

If a movie was made about your life, what would it be called?: Oh jeez.....umm...Hiding in the Wings.....

What's your biggest fear?: I guess losing someone very close to me....I have had it happen and it can just about tear your heart out.

Can you sing?: Yes....will I be going on American Idol? NOT A CHANCE IN HELL!

Do you ever pretend to be someone else just to look cool?: Nope...not that I know of

Are you a loner?: Sometimes...it's all about the mood, but I do liek to have my own time!

What are your #1 priorities in life?: Family and friends.

If you were another person, would you be friends with you?: Wow! Umm....I don't know, I mean I don't see why not. I'm nice and funny...

Are you a daredevil?: Ha! I am just a chicken shit 

Is there anything you fear or hate about yourself?: I am afraid of becoming an alcholic...it runs in my family...neither of my parents are but, my uncle and grandmothers are...I don't want to become addicted to cigarettes either....I have an addictive personality.

Are you passive or aggressive?: Passive....I don't usually enjoy confrontation....so I try and be the peacemaker

Do you have a journal?: yes, which is probably why I don't write in my live journal that much!

What is your greatest strength?: I'm accepting of different people

What is your greatest weakness?: Impatience

If you could change one thing about yourself, what would it be?: God, ummm...to be able to have the motivation to lose weight I guess

Do you think you are emotionally strong?: I'm getting there

Is there anything you regret doing/not doing in life?: No

Do you think life has been good so far?: It's been difficult at times, but yes I do believe it has.

What is the most important lesson you've learned from life?: To love yourself is the most important thing.


Are you confident?: Not all the time.

What is the fictional character you are most like?: Uhhh...Rory Gilmore....The Girlmore Girls is sort of frighteningly a little bit like my life...my aunt is Sookie.

Are you perceived wrongly?: Ummm...I'm sure I am.


Do You...

Smoke?: Nope

Do drugs?: Never

Read the newspaper?: Sometimes

Pray?: Somtimes....generally no though

Go to church?: Not since I was confirmed about five years ago

Talk to strangers who IM you?: Nope! I did once and that has convinced me never to do it again

Sleep with stuffed animals?: Used to

Take walks in the rain?: Yes

Talk to people even though you hate them?: Yep. I like being civil to people....but if they don't talk to me I don't talk to them.

Drive?: Yes and no....those who know me understand

Like to drive fast?: umm....it would be very unwise of me to do this....but for some reason driving to RI always makes me go 80.


Would or Have You Ever?

Liked your voice?: Yes

Hurt yourself?: No

Been out of the country?: Sadly no....hopefully London or Scotland in junior year.

Eaten something that made other people sick?: Ummm...not that I know of

Been in love?: Not yet

Done drugs?: Never

Gone skinny dipping?: Yes

Had a medical emergency?: Yes....tripped and fell and cut my eyelid...almost all the doctors thought I had broken my orbit which is your eye socket. I almost had to have emergency surgery until another doctor came in and made the conclusion that it wasn't.Whew!

Had surgery?: Yah! Two....both times I got tubes in my ears to help hear better!

Run away from home?: Nope

Played strip poker?: Nope

Gotten beaten up?: Ha! I think if anyone beat me up...5 people would beat that person up for beating me up...loyal friends...gotta love 'em.

Beaten someone up?: Nope....well...4th grade I hit someone with a lacrosse stick....twice....but not hard enough to hurt him...

Been picked on?: Oddly enough nope....and I'm a fat kid...I mean...it's weird....you would think so, but never.

Been on stage?: Yes, singing and playing the orchestra, but never speaking...i hate speaking in front of people

Slept outdoors?: YES!!!!  I like camping!!! 

Thought about suicide?: Never and even if I did I am too chicken to actually go through with it.... Besides the fact is that women are less likely to commit suicide...men are.

Pulled an all nighter?: Not yet...earliest is 4am and that wasn't doing work!

If yes, what is your record?: N/A

Gone one day without food?: Yes, when I have had food poisoning and the stomach flu

Talked on the phone all night?: Nope!

Slept together with the opposite sex w/o actually having sex?: Yes

Slept all day?: Nope...the latest I have ever slept in is 11am

Killed someone?: Nope!

Made out with a stranger?: Nope

Had sex with a stranger?: Nope

Thought you're going crazy?: Hahahaha!!! Maybe....but it's from too much thinking

Kissed the same sex?: No

Done anything sexual with the same sex?: Nope

Been betrayed?: Yes...I think everyone has been betrayed at some time.

Had a dream that came true?: Oh yes....isn't that deja vu?!

Broken the law?: umm....don't think so...could have...o wait I did...I stole some gum when I was like 7...

Met a famous person?: Yes.

Have you ever killed an animal by accident?: Nope

On purpose?: Spiders....bugs...

Told a secret you swore you wouldn't tell?: Yes....but it was to my mom and it was important that I told her....my friend was crying out for help...

Stolen anything?: Yes...::hanging head in shame::!

Been on radio/tv?: Ummm...I don't believe so

Been in a mosh-pit?: Not quite

Had a nervous breakdown?: Nope

Bungee jumped?: Nope...but it looks fun

Had a dream that kept coming back?: Mmmhmmm


Beliefs

Believe in life on other planets?: Yes....they may not exist anymore, but at one time at least I think so.

Miracles?: O yeah!

Astrology?: Not really, but you never know

Magic?: Illusions

God?: I believe there is a God....that is all I am going to say.

Satan?: Ehh..why not....I belive in a God, why not believe in Satan?

Santa?: Not anymore, too bad....

Ghosts?: Yes very much so....I have stories

Luck?: Sometimes

Love at first sight?: No...lust at first sight i believe in.

Yin and yang (that good cant exist w/o bad)?: Yes

Witches?: I know of the Wicca religion...I believe in them, but other than that no

Easter bunny?: Lol....nope

Believe its possible to remain faithful forever?: Yes, even though I don't think some people understand the meaning of monogamy

Believe there's a pot of gold at the end of a rainbow?: Umm...nope

Do you wish on stars?: Nope


Deep Theological Questions

Do you believe in the traditional view of Heaven and Hell?: No

Do you think God has a gender?: Wow...good question and no....haven't you ever seen Joan of Arcadia?! Kidding...don't get mad at me

Do you believe in organized religion?: I guess....I was brought up Roman Catholic

Where do you think we go when we die?: I'm not sure....I believe in reincarnation...and heaven...so....I don't really know where that would put us!


Friends

Do you have any gay/lesbian friends?: Yes.....

Newest?: Eileen, Parker and Alisha

Funniest?: O man, all my friends are funny....Joe and Lea though...holy christ togther they are nuts....Parker...

Sweetest?: Hmmm....Robin...he's a cutie...and Joe....

Closest?: Hmmm....Parker and Eileen

Weirdest?: Uh....hmm......Lauren...she's not weird....she's weird cool...she's probabyly the coolest person I know

Smartest?: Hmm....I have no idea

Ditziest?: Allie....o man she thought the middle seat belt was the coolest thing because it was a lap seatbelt.

Last person you talked to online?: Ummm...I think it was parker

Who do you talk to most online?: lol....lea, parker, eileen and katie

Who are you on the phone with most?: my parents, lea, amanda

Who do you trust most?: I trust all my friends, that is why they are my friends, the ones i don't trust i don't talk to anymore

Who listens to your problems?: My mom...parker definitely....he knows to say, "Wow that sucks." just when I want to hear it!

Who do you fight most with?: I'm a peaceful person...the last time i had a fight was with amanda and it was a stupid thing.

Who's the nicest?: Everyone!!!!!!

Who's the best singer?: Nicole

Who's house were you last at?: Umm...my aunts

Friend that lives farthest away: FRANCES!!!!!!!!! I miss ya babe!!!!


Love and All That

Do you consider love a mistake?: Nope

If someone you had no interest in had interest in dating you how would you feel?: I think I'd probably go out with them at least once,but as friends.

Do you prefer knowing someone before dating them or going out: I like knowing first.

Have you ever wished it was more socially acceptable for a girl to ask a guy out: not really

What's the last present someone gave you?: Ummm...I didn't get anything for Easter so probably Valentines Day...I got a book and some candy.

Are you in love?: Nope

Do you consider your significant other hot?: Don't have one...didn't we go over this like a billion questions ago?!


Who Was the Last Person...

That haunted you?: Uh....?

You wanted to kill?: ummm certain people that insist on annoying my family and have gotten to my last nerve with some of the things they have done....

That you laughed at?: Eileen

That laughed at you?: Parker and Eileen

To make you cry?: I'd rather not say 

To brighten up your day?: No one could brighten up the day.....it's freaking RAINING OUT AGAIN!!!!!!!!! GRRRRRRRRR!!!!!

That you thought about?: Nicole...she asked me how to cook a baked potato...so...I was wondering what she was cooking and who for!!!! I love my Nikki!!! You know I am driving up to your apartment this summer!

You talked to through MSN?: MSN? WTF? Don't have it!

Will it be with your significant other?: N/A

Or some random person?: N/A

Body part you're touching right now: None actually since I am typing!
